definition: having two horns or horn-shaped parts, a cocked hat with the brim turned up to form two points
details:
adjective
- having two horns or horn-shaped parts
= example: having two horns or horn-shaped parts
= synonyms: bicorned, bicornate, bicornuate, bicornuous
noun
- a cocked hat with the brim turned up to form two points
= synonyms: bicorne
